name: Pear Quinoa Chai spice Bread loaf
description: A mildly sweet yeast bread with a hint of chai spice. There is cooked quinoa in every slice, this makes for an amazing breakfast addition as is, or as a french toast. Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, nut.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon chai spice (My chai spice blend recipe here)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add 2 Tablespoons warm water, yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar. Mix well and wait to get frothy(8-10 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add 2 Tablespoons warm water, yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar. Mix well and wait to get frothy(8-10 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Quinoa in 3/4 cup water, covered on low for 15 minutes or until tender. Or use scant 1 cup cooked quinoa.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Quinoa in 3/4 cup water, covered on low for 15 minutes or until tender. Or use scant 1 cup cooked quinoa.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the quinoa cool a little, then blend cooked quinoa, pear, spices, salt and rest of the sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the quinoa cool a little, then blend cooked quinoa, pear, spices, salt and rest of the sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add whole wheat flour, bread flour and this puree to the yeast mix and knead for 5-7 minutes. Add more bread flour or water if needed to get a soft dough. The dough might be slightly sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Add whole wheat flour, bread flour and this puree to the yeast mix and knead for 5-7 minutes. Add more bread flour or water if needed to get a soft dough. The dough might be slightly sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Let dough sit in a well greased container, covered in a warm place until doubled(1.5 hours)
recipeInstructions.name: Let dough sit in a well greased container, covered in a warm place until doubled(1.5 hours)

recipeInstructions.text: Take dough out and using a little bread flour, shape into a loaf or a jelly roll.
recipeInstructions.name: Take dough out and using a little bread flour, shape into a loaf or a jelly roll.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf or roll with seam side down in a greased or parchment lined regular size bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf or roll with seam side down in a greased or parchment lined regular size bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz top with water and then with a little oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz top with water and then with a little oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with towel and let sit until doubled. (45 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with towel and let sit until doubled. (45 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes until golden and a tap on the top sounds hollow.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes until golden and a tap on the top sounds hollow.

keywords: bread recipe, spiced bread, vegan bread
